cohort: Any characteristics of the population(s) studied, plus whether the result was taken from a subgroup of the cohort tested.
is_model: gene signature is a computed model
publication_reference_url: Rechtien et al. (2017) Systems Vaccinology Identifies an Early Innate Immune Signature as a Correlate of Antibody Responses to the Ebola Vaccine rVSV-ZEBOV. Cell Rep. PMID: 28854372
publication_date: print publication date or posted date if not in print (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY)
signature_source: signature source figure, table or text section
subm_obs_id: ID of observation within its own submission
uniq_obs_id: Uniq ID of observation within its submission type

signature_source: Results: Early Gene Expression Signature Linked to the IP-10 Pathway Correlates with Later GP-Specific Antibody Responses to the Vaccine
comments: only TIFA was significantly differentially expressed at the concerned time point compared with baseline (D0 log2 mean expression, 3.38; D1 log2 fold change, 1.33; multiplicity-adjusted p value, 1.14E-09; Figure S6)
